constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 子序列内的最小值大于子序列中的所有元素
constraints.formal: ∀ l, r (l < r), min(A[l:r]) > A[i] for all i in (l, r)

constraints.name: area_calculation
constraints.description: 池塘面积计算基于两端的最小值，并考虑中间元素对面积的影响
constraints.formal: Area = (R - L + 1) * min(A[L], A[R]) - sum(max(0, A[i] - min(A[L], A[R]))) for i in (L, R)
